text: Peter Anthony Hecomovich (June 13, 1918 – May 21, 1993) was an American multi- sport athlete in football and basketball. In basketball, he played in the National Basketball League for the Oshkosh All-Stars in one game during the 1940–41 season. In football, he was the starting quarterback for the University of Idaho and was selected as the 284th overall pick in the 1943 NFL Draft, but did not actually play in the NFL. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1993 deaths Category:American army personnel of World War II Category:American football quarterbacks Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Minnesota Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Idaho Vandals football players Category:Idaho Vandals men's basketball players Category:Military personnel from Minnesota Category:Oshkosh All-Stars players Category:People from Itasca County, Minnesota Category:Players of American football from Minnesota
title: Pete Hecomovich
